title: Andrew Warren
paragraphs: I’m a Web Developer, Technologist and Adventurer.
I’ve always had an interest in technology and computing and two years ago, I embarked on a programming career. I love making things and relish the chance to solve a problem.

Initially inspired by undertaking a programming centric final major project for my Music Technology degree, I turned to the web, as a stage to expand my knowledge, allowing me to couple my creativity with technical interests.
Working for smaller companies has given me insight into the priorities and challenges a project is faced with. Writing maintainable, modular and testable code is critical for a projects success.
I’m currently working with: JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, NodeJS and Java.
Tools I use include: Git, Gitlab, NPM, Grunt, Docker and AWS.
